actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37 of the United States Code in order to provide incentives for lawyers to enter and remain in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Authorizes special pay in order to provide incentives for lawyers to enter and remain in the Armed Forces judge advocate programs. Sets forth pay schedules for such purposes and duty requirements for qualification thereunder. (Amends 37 U.S.C. 302).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37 of the United States Code in order to provide incentives for lawyers to enter and remain in the Armed Forces.
